# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration Summary

## Migration Date
January 29, 2026

## Overview
Successfully migrated the Jaxxy project from Java 8 to Java 17. The build now compiles and all tests pass with `mvn clean verify`.

## Major Changes

### 1. Java Version Update
- **File**: `pom.xml` (root)
- **Changes**:
  - Updated `maven.compiler.source` from `1.8` to `17`
  - Updated `maven.compiler.target` from `1.8` to `17`
  - Added `maven.compiler.release` property set to `17`

### 2. Package Namespace Migration (javax → jakarta)
All Java source files were updated to use Jakarta EE 9+ package names:
- `javax.ws.rs.*` → `jakarta.ws.rs.*`
- `javax.servlet.*` → `jakarta.servlet.*`
- `javax.json.*` → `jakarta.json.*`
- `javax.xml.bind.*` → `jakarta.xml.bind.*`
- `javax.activation.*` → `jakarta.activation.*`
- `javax.annotation.*` → `jakarta.annotation.*`

**Tool Used**: sed command to replace imports across all .java files

### 3. Dependency Version Updates

#### Core Dependencies
| Dependency | Old Version | New Version |
|------------|-------------|-------------|
| assertj-core | 3.18.1 | 3.26.3 |
| auth0-jwt | 3.11.0 | 4.4.0 |
| commons-lang3 | 3.11 | 3.17.0 |
| commons-io | 2.6 | 2.17.0 |
| guava | 30.0-jre | 33.3.1-jre |
| gson | 2.8.6 | 2.11.0 |
| jackson | 2.9.6 | 2.17.2 |
| junit-jupiter | 5.7.0 | 5.11.0 |
| lombok | 1.18.16 | 1.18.34 |
| mockito | 3.6.0 | 5.13.0 |
| protobuf-java | 3.13.0 | 4.28.2 |
| slf4j | 1.7.29 | 2.0.16 |
| rxjava | 2.2.2 | 2.2.21 |
| reactor-core | 3.4.0 | 3.6.10 |

#### Jakarta EE Dependencies
| Dependency | Old Version | New Version |
|------------|-------------|-------------|
| jakarta.activation-api | 1.2.1 | 2.1.3 |
| jakarta.annotation-api | 1.3.4 | 2.1.1 |
| jakarta.ws.rs-api | 2.1.5 | 3.1.0 |
| jakarta.xml.bind-api | 2.3.2 | 4.0.2 |
| jakarta.servlet-api | 3.1.0 | 6.1.0 |
| jakarta.json.bind-api | 1.0.1 | 3.0.1 |
| jakarta.json-api | 1.1.5 | 2.1.3 |

#### Framework Dependencies
| Dependency | Old Version | New Version |
|------------|-------------|-------------|
| Apache CXF | 3.4.1 | 4.0.5 |
| Spring Boot | 2.4.0 | 3.3.4 |
| Johnzon | 1.2.8 | 1.2.21 |
| Swagger | 1.6.2 | 1.6.14 |
| Swagger UI | 3.31.1 | 5.17.14 |

### 4. Maven Plugin Updates
| Plugin | Old Version | New Version |
|--------|-------------|-------------|
| maven-clean-plugin | 3.1.0 | 3.4.0 |
| maven-resources-plugin | 3.1.0 | 3.3.1 |
| maven-compiler-plugin | 3.8.0 | 3.13.0 |
| maven-surefire-plugin | 3.0.0-M1 | 3.5.1 |
| maven-jar-plugin | 3.1.0 | 3.4.2 |
| maven-install-plugin | 3.0.0-M1 | 3.1.3 |
| maven-deploy-plugin | 3.0.0-M1 | 3.1.3 |
| maven-source-plugin | 3.0.1 | 3.3.1 |
| maven-javadoc-plugin | 3.0.1 | 3.10.1 |
| maven-gpg-plugin | 1.6 | 3.2.7 |
| maven-release-plugin | 2.5.3 | 3.1.1 |
| nexus-staging-maven-plugin | 1.6.8 | 1.7.0 |
| maven-site-plugin | 3.7.1 | 3.20.0 |
| os-maven-plugin | 1.6.0 | 1.7.1 |
| protobuf-maven-plugin | 0.5.1 | 0.6.1 |

### 5. Apache CXF 4.x Migration Changes

#### Removed Deprecated Swagger Support
- **File**: `pom.xml` (root)
- **Removed**: `cxf-rt-rs-service-description-swagger` dependency (no longer exists in CXF 4.x)
- **Retained**: `cxf-rt-rs-service-description-openapi-v3` for OpenAPI 3.x support

#### Example Module Updates
- **File**: `example/pom.xml`
- **Removed**: `cxf-rt-rs-service-description-swagger` dependency

- **File**: `example/src/main/java/org/jaxxy/example/config/JaxxyExampleConfiguration.java`
